posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Test
posts.text: this is just a test.I am iron man. done not yet flash Can you tell me? 123Alice->Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?Note right of Bob: Bob thinksBob-->Alice: I am good thanks! 12345678st=>start: Startop=>operation: Your Operationcond=>condition: Yes or No?e=>endst->op->condcond(yes)->econd(no)->op

posts.title: V2ray配置脚本
posts.text: BBR加速1. 安装相应的内核 2. 开启内核对应的加速 1wget -N --no-check-certificate "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chiakge/Linux-NetSpeed/master/tcp.sh" && chmod +x tcp.sh && ./tcp.sh v2ray一键安装脚本「适用于Debian9」1. 更新系统,安装curl 1apt-get update -y && apt-get install curl -y 2. 安装vray 1bash <(curl -s -L https://git.io/v2ray.sh) 3. 修改alterID「默认为233」 1vim /etc/v2ray/233blog_v2ray_backup.conf

posts.title: 这是一篇文章
posts.text: Advertisement :)__ pica - high quality and fast imageresize in browser. babelfish - developer friendlyi18n with plurals support and easy syntax. You will like those projects! h1 Heading 8-)h2 Headingh3 Headingh4 Headingh5 Headingh6 HeadingHorizontal Rules Typographic replacementsEnable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ EmphasisThis is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Strikethrough Blockquotes Blockquotes can also be nested… …by using additional greater-than signs right next to each other… …or with spaces between arrows. ListsUnordered Create a list by starting a line with +, -, or * Sub-lists are made by indenting 2 spaces: Marker character change forces new list start: Ac tristique libero volutpat at Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet Nulla volutpat aliquam velit Very easy! Ordered Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet Consectetur adipiscing elit Integer molestie lorem at massa You can use sequential numbers… …or keep all the numbers as 1. Start numbering with offset: foo bar CodeInline code Indented code // Some comments line 1 of code line 2 of code line 3 of codeBlock code “fences” 1Sample text here... Syntax highlighting 12345var foo = function (bar) { return bar++;};console.log(foo(5)); Tables Option Description data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates. engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default. ext extension to be used for dest files. Right aligned columns Option Description data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates. engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default. ext extension to be used for dest files. Linkslink text link with title Autoconverted link https://github.com/nodeca/pica (enable linkify to see) Images Like links, Images also have a footnote style syntax With a reference later in the document defining the URL location: PluginsThe killer feature of markdown-it is very effective support ofsyntax plugins. Emojies Classic markup: :wink: :crush: :cry: :tear: :laughing: :yum: Shortcuts (emoticons): :-) :-( 8-) ;) see how to change output with twemoji. Subscript / Superscript 19^th^ H2O <ins>++Inserted text++ <mark>==Marked text== FootnotesFootnote 1 link[^first]. Footnote 2 link[^second]. Inline footnote^[Text of inline footnote] definition. Duplicated footnote reference[^second]. [^first]: Footnote can have markup and multiple paragraphs.[^second]: Footnote text. Definition listsTerm 1 : Definition 1with lazy continuation. Term 2 with inline markup : Definition 2 { some code, part of Definition 2 } Third paragraph of definition 2.Compact style: Term 1 ~ Definition 1 Term 2 ~ Definition 2a ~ Definition 2b AbbreviationsThis is HTML abbreviation example. It converts “HTML”, but keep intact partial entries like “xxxHTMLyyy” and so on. *[HTML]: Hyper Text Markup Language Custom containers::: warninghere be dragons:::

posts.title: Manjaro的安装
posts.text: Manjaro安装完成后需要的一些环境配置「自用」。 修改中国镜像1sudo pacman-mirrors -i -c China -m rank 中国manjaro/arch源1vim /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist 12345678##中科大Server = https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/manjaro/stable/$repo/$arch##清华大学Server = https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/manjaro/stable/$repo/$arch##上海交通大学Server = https://mirrors.sjtug.sjtu.edu.cn/manjaro/stable/$repo/$arch##浙江大学Server = https://mirrors.zju.edu.cn/manjaro/stable/$repo/$arch 123456##清华大学Server = https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch##163Server = http://mirrors.163.com/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch##aliyunServer = http://mirrors.aliyun.com/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch 安装git vim htop neofetch1sudo pacman -S git vim htop neofetch 添加archcn源1sudo vim /etc/pacman.conf 添加清华镜像123[archlinuxcn]SigLevel= TrustedOnlyServer = https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/$arch 安装archlinuxcn-keyring1sudo pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring 安装yay1sudo pacman -S yay 使用yay安装jdk12345yay jdk##查看jdk状态archlinux-java status##设置默认jdksudo archlinux-java set java-12-jdk zsh和oh my zsh12chsh -s /bin/zshwget https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh -O - | sh 插件两个12git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlightinggit clone git://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions $ZSH_CUSTOM/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions 主题「spaceship」12git clone https://github.com/denysdovhan/spaceship-prompt.git "$ZSH_CUSTOM/themes/spaceship-prompt"ln -s "$ZSH_CUSTOM/themes/spaceship-prompt/spaceship.zsh-theme" "$ZSH_CUSTOM/themes/spaceship.zsh-theme" 输入法123sudo pacman -S fcitx-imsudo pacman -S fcitx-configtoolsudo pacman -S fcitx-rime 修改配置1234sudo vim ~/.xprofileexport GTK_MODULE=fcitxexport QT_IM_MODULE=fcitxexport XMODIFIERS="@im=fcitx" 代理终端代理1sudo pacman -S proxychains-ng Qv2ray1sudo pacman -S qv2ray 目录1234567sudo pacman -S xdg-user-dirs-gtkexport LANG=en_USxdg-user-dirs-gtk-update#然后会有个窗口提示语言更改，更新名称即可export LANG=zh_CN.UTF-8xdg-user-dirs-gtk-update#提示语言更改，保留旧的名称即可 时间1sudo timedatectl set-local-rtc true

posts.title: SM.MS图床设置
posts.text: 使用typora写文时设置讲图片自动上传到sm.ms加快图片加载。 SM.MS注册sm.ms默认免费支持5GB的存储空间。 PicGO安装设置在github下载平台用的版本，下面以win版为例。 安装完成后在C:\Users\YourName\AppData\Local\Programs\PicGo可以找到。 进入PicGo，左侧「插件设置」，搜索smms找到插件安装。 进入sm.ms网站「User」–›「Dashboard」–›「API Token」，复制Secret Token。 回到PicGo，「图床设置」–›「SM.MS-登录用户」，填入Secret Token，可以上传一下图片看看行8行。 Typora设置「文件」–›「偏好设置」–›「图像」，如下设置。 如果找不到可以先设置显示隐藏文件。 完成之后只要图片复制到typora就会出现上传图片的popup，选择之后就会自动上传而且图片的url也会改成sm.ms的路径。 unsplash-logoAnthony Ievlev
